34 #include <lidar_segmentation/lidar_segmentation.h>
35 #include "calibration/sick_ldmrs.h"

46 
54 void CalculateCircle(ClusterPtr cluster, double& R, Point& Center)
55 {
56  double Sx=0,Sy=0,x_m,y_m,u,v,Suu,Svv,Suv,Suuu,Svvv,Suvv,Svuu,uc,vc;
57  for(int i=0;i<cluster->support_points.size();i++)
58  {
59  Sx+=cluster->support_points[i]->x;
60  Sy+=cluster->support_points[i]->y;
61  }
62  x_m=Sx/cluster->support_points.size();
63  y_m=Sy/cluster->support_points.size();
64 
65  for(int i=0;i<cluster->support_points.size();i++)
66  {
67  u=cluster->support_points[i]->x-x_m;
68  v=cluster->support_points[i]->y-y_m;
69  Suu+=pow(u,2);
70  Svv+=pow(v,2);
71  Suv+=u*v;
72  Suuu+=pow(u,3);
73  Svvv+=pow(v,3);
74  Svuu+=v*pow(u,2);
75  Suvv+=u*pow(v,2);
76  }
77 
78  vc=(Suu*0.5*(Svvv+Svuu)-Suv*0.5*(Suuu+Suvv))/(Svv*Suu-Suv*Suv);
79  uc=(0.5*(Suuu+Suvv)-vc*Suv)/Suu;
80  vc=vc+y_m;
81  uc=uc+x_m;
82 
83  Center.x=uc;
84  Center.y=vc;
85 
86  for(int i=0;i<cluster->support_points.size();i++)
87  R+=sqrt(pow((cluster->support_points[i]->x-uc),2) + pow((cluster->support_points[i]->y-vc),2));
88 
89  R=R/cluster->support_points.size();
90 }
91 
100 void circlePoints(vector<ClusterPtr>& circle_points, double radius, double centre[3], int number_points)
101 {
102  double increment = M_PI*2/number_points;
103  ClusterPtr cPoints (new Cluster);
104  for(int i=0;i<=number_points;i++)
105  {
106  double angle = i * increment;
107  PointPtr coord (new Point);
108  coord->x=centre[0] + sin(angle)*radius;
109  coord->y=centre[1] + cos(angle)*radius;
110  cPoints->support_points.push_back(coord);
111  }
112  circle_points.push_back(cPoints);
113 }
114 
121 void convertDataToXY(sensor_msgs::LaserScan scan, C_DataFromFilePtr& data_gt)
122 {
123  C_DataFromFilePtr data (new C_DataFromFile);
124  int s=scan.ranges.size();
125  int l=1;
126  double X, Y;
127  for(int n=0; n<s; n++)
128  {
129  double angle, d, x, y, z;
130  d=scan.ranges[n];
131  z=0;
132  angle = scan.angle_min + n*scan.angle_increment;
133  if(angle>=0)
134  {
135  x=d*cos(angle);
136  y=d*sin(angle);
137  }
138  else
139  {
140  angle = abs(angle);
141  x = d*cos(angle);
142  y = -d*sin(angle);
143  }
144 
145  X+=x;
146  Y+=y;
147  data->x_valuesf.push_back(x);
148  data->y_valuesf.push_back(y);
149  data->z_valuesf.push_back(z);
150  data->labels.push_back(l);
151  }
152  data->iteration=s;
153  data_gt=data;
154 }
